package main

extern func print(string)

extern func itoa(int) string

#init
func main() {
	print(itoa(1+1))
	print(itoa(0+1))
	print(itoa(1+0))

	print("-")

	print(itoa(1*1))
	print(itoa(1*0))
	print(itoa(0*1))

	print("-")

	print(itoa(5/1))
	print(itoa(1/5))
	print(itoa(0/1))

	print("-")

	print(itoa(1-1))
	print(itoa(0-1))
	print(itoa(1-0))

	print("-")

	print(itoa(1%5))
	print(itoa(6%5))
	print(itoa(-1%5))
}
---
2
1
1
-
1
0
0
-
5
0
0
-
0
-1
1
-
1
1
-1
